My Creative Process

All of my developments projects are based off of a practiced formula to get the result that I am looking for

1

Discuss The Project

A proper communication and exchange of ideas is necessary for creating the best product that helps both the company and it's clients. So I focus on making a good exchange of vocals and ideas before starting the project.

2

Brainstorming and Concept

Once I get a gist of the client needs then it's time for brainstorming and coming up with possible ideas to make the structure and framework to begin creating and working the magic of code.

3

Visual Design

A basic framework will just be basic until the visual picks up the image and lifts it up. Here comes the part of turning a skeleton into a human.

4

Interaction

After a mock up demo it's time for interaction with the clients for touch ups and if necessary modification of certain aspects to suit the clients taste. And finally deliver a flawless final product.
